author: arnetheduck
content: "consensus client" is something of a misnomer in that it comprises of two "roles" typically, in the general architecture: the beacon node and the validator client - the beacon api is the api that the beacon node exposes (mainly to the validator client) so it should reasonably be called a beacon API

author: mariohavel
content: Are you aware of anybody mining Sepolia? In case somebody is mining, please tell them to stop because the Merge will occur sooner than expected. Somebody started to put around 20GH/s there during last hour
